excerpt.rendered:
Macallan Folio 2 : The “Archival Series” from Macallan is a limited edition, distillery only release which recreates the old advertising styles of The Macallan. The front image features a watercolor image by Artist Sara Midda while the whisky itself is a 12 year old aged in sherry cask. Released in 2017, it is the 2nd release in the Archival Series, and is presented in a tin book style package, which includes a USB stick with distillery photographs from advertisement archives.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 12
Vintage : 
ABV : 43.00%
